name: Rineke Dijkstra
caption: Dijkstra in 2011
works: Beach Portraits, Almerisa, Olivier, The Buzzclub, Daniel, Adi, Shira, and Keren, Rishonim High School, Herzliya, Israel
summary: Rineke Dijkstra (born 2 June 1959) is a Dutch photographer. She lives and works in Amsterdam. Dijkstra has been awarded an Honorary Fellowship of the Royal Photographic Society, the 1999 Citibank Private Bank Photography Prize (now Deutsche BÃ¶rse Photography Prize) and the 2017 Hasselblad Award.
